byline.original: By VIKAS BAJAJ AND HEATHER TIMMONS

abstract: The Indian media debates R.K. Gupta's fall from grace.
snippet: The Indian media debates R.K. Gupta's fall from grace.
lead_paragraph: Since federal prosecutors charged Rajat Gupta, a former managing director of McKinsey & Co., last week with securities fraud in New York, passionate debate has raged in India about his motives and his legacy. His stunning fall from grace has inspired everything from soul-searching to conspiracy theories to folksy explanations of the charges.

headline.main: Once Revered, Business Icon is Now Reviled
